casebody.data:
Larry PRICE, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
CITY OF UNION CITY, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Sky Pointe, LLC, and DHJ Holdings, LLC, Defendants-Respondents. C-903 September Term 2017
080838 Supreme Court of New Jersey. June 1, 2018

To go the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000285-16 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
